vps_terminate_question: Are you sure you want to delete your service {{vps}}?
vps_terminate_success: The cancellation of your service has been processed. You will receive a confirmation email to confirm the cancellation.
vps_terminate_success_engagement: Your request has been received, and will be processed as soon as possible.
vps_terminate_error: An error has occurred cancelling the service.
vps_terminate_unavailable: You have signed up to this plan for a period of {{ monthCount }} months. If you have any queries, please feel free to get in touch with our support team via telephone, or by creating a support ticket. Thank you for your understanding.
vps_terminate_option_terminate_at_expira: Cancel service on its expiry date.
vps_terminate_option_terminate_now_descr: You will be sent an email detailing the steps for cancelling this server.
vps_terminate_warning_data_deletion: The deletion of your service will permanently erase all corresponding data.
vps_terminate_warning_no_refund: The cancellation action does not entitle you to a refund.
vps_terminate_warning_manual_refund: Cancelling your service does not guarantee that any refunds will be granted. Please contact the support team if you have any queries regarding refunds.
vps_terminate_activate_delete_at_expirat: Your request to cancel this service on its expiry date has been processed.
An error has occurred submitting the request to cancel this service on its expiry date:
vps_terminate_deactivate_delete_at_expir: The request to cancel this service on its expiry date has been suspended.
